categories: Category:Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi trade paperbacks

nodes.text: Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi Book Two—Prisoner of Bogan

Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi Book Two—Prisoner of Bogan is a Star Wars Legends trade paperback that collects the five-part comic-book series Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi—The Prisoner of Bogan from author John Ostrander. It was published by Dark Horse Books on August 6, 2013.

Xesh, a mysterious alien warrior, is enthralled with the madman Daegen Lok and his obsession with conquering known space. Hunter teams are dispatched by the Je'daii to stop Lok and save the misguided Xesh, but they're not alone. Xesh's former masters have sent their own hunter—with orders to kill!
